name: DivideBy
description:
DivideBy is a simple to play, difficult to master, puzzle game. It challenges while improving your mental arithmetic skills.

To start press either the Easy or the Hard button. Your objective is to clear ten levels within 999 seconds. For each level arrange the tiles so that one of the rows or one of the columns can be divided exactly by the requested number. Tiles adjacent to the empty space are moved by clicking or tapping.

For each level, the program recognises when you have found the correct solution.
